attributes.action: Hold a referendum on rejoining the European Union
attributes.additional_details: Its time to let the public decide whether they wish to seek to rejoin the European Union. We demand a referendum on joining the European Union (EU).
attributes.background: Hold a referendum on rejoining the European Union (EU)
